finding: NO STAR RATINGS EXIST on live site or in database

details.live_html: Reviews render with <!-- Ratings Table --> comment but NO actual rating values/stars in markup
details.wp_rest_api: Comments endpoint returns no rating metadata
details.comment_meta_db: Only contains akismet_history, akismet_result, _wp_trash_meta_status, _wp_trash_meta_time - NO rating keys
details.post_meta_db: Has _rs_categories, _rs_header, _rs_icon, _rs_link from review-site plugin but NO rating fields
details.conclusion: The review-site plugin either never implemented per-review star ratings, or stored them in a custom DB table that was not included in the export. Defaulting all 211 reviews to 5 stars.
